About Greenova

Greenova is a youth-led startup initiative that blends sustainable products with practical climate learning. We design items people actually use, and we teach climate awareness in a simple, friendly way.

Problem

Plastic use is rising and many communities have limited access to affordable eco-friendly alternatives. Climate learning often stays theoretical.

Solution

We make reusable jute products and run climate education sessions that connect daily habits with real impact.

Value

Practical products, local skills, and climate awareness, delivered as a model that can scale.

Products

We build simple, durable products with a clean design language. Institutions and individuals can both adopt these items.

Climate education for kids

We teach climate basics through stories, games, and quick quizzes. The goal is simple: help children understand the planet and build better habits.

Mini lessons

Short and friendly learning topics.

  • What is climate and weather
  • Why trees matter
  • Reduce, reuse, recycle
  • Plastic and pollution
  • Clean energy basics

Quick quiz

Answer and get instant feedback.

1) Which one is reusable
2) What helps reduce heat in cities
3) The best first step to reduce waste is

Class kit idea

A simple kit for school sessions that includes a reusable pouch, a worksheet, and a mini pledge card. Kids take it home and teach one new habit to their family.

Green pledge

I will carry a reusable bag and avoid single-use plastic this week.
